Content:
# react-native-gallery-preview
**GalleryPreview** is a flexible modal component for easy gallery previews with full gesture support. Using `Reanimated` and `React Native Gesture Handler`, it gives a smooth and simple user experience for both iOS and Android. ### Features * âš¡ **Smooth Gesture Interactions and Animations:** Experience fluid and responsive animations and gestures for a delightful user interface. * ğŸ” **Double Tap and Pinch to zoom:** Users can effortlessly zoom in and out of images with simple double-tap and pinch gestures * ğŸ‘† **Pull down to close:** Intuitive pull-down gesture to close the gallery preview, making navigation seamless. * â†”ï¸ **RTL Support** * ğŸ“± **Supports both `iOS` and `Android`:** Fully compatible with both iOS and Android devices, ensuring a consistent experience across platforms. * ğŸ“± **Compatible with `Expo`** ### Get started Before you can use GalleryPreview, you need to set up react-native-reanimated and react-native-gesture-handler. Follow the links below for detailed installation guides: * [Setting up Reanimated](https://docs.swmansion.com/react-native-reanimated/docs/fundamentals/getting-started/#installation) * [Setting up React Native Gesture Handler](htâ†”ï¸tps://docs.swmansion.com/react-native-gesture-handler/docs/fundamentals/installation) Once the dependencies are installed, you can add react-native-gallery-preview to your project:

# react-native-gallery-preview
**GalleryPreview** ã¯ã€ãƒ•ãƒ«ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼å¯¾å¿œã®ç°¡å˜ãªã‚®ãƒ£ãƒ©ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ç”¨ã®æŸ”è»Ÿãªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚`Reanimated` ã¨ `React Native Gesture Handler` ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã€iOS ã¨ Android ä¸¡æ–¹ã§ã‚¹ãƒ ãƒ¼ã‚ºã§ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ä½“é¨“ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ### ç‰¹å¾´ * âš¡ **ã‚¹ãƒ ãƒ¼ã‚ºãªã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼æ“ä½œã¨ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³:** æµã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§å¿œç­”æ€§ã®é«˜ã„ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¨ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹å¿«é©ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’å®Ÿç¾ã€‚ * ğŸ” **ãƒ€ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—ã¨ãƒ”ãƒ³ãƒã§ã‚ºãƒ¼ãƒ :** ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ç°¡å˜ãªãƒ€ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—ã¨ãƒ”ãƒ³ãƒã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ã§ç”»åƒã‚’è‡ªç”±ã«ã‚ºãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ»ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆå¯èƒ½ã€‚ * ğŸ‘† **ä¸‹ã«å¼•ã£å¼µã£ã¦é–‰ã˜ã‚‹:** ç›´æ„Ÿçš„ãªä¸‹ã«å¼•ã£å¼µã‚‹ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ã§ã‚®ãƒ£ãƒ©ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã€ãƒŠãƒ“ã‚²ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ã‚¹ãƒ ãƒ¼ã‚ºã«ã€‚ * â†”ï¸ **RTLå¯¾å¿œ** * ğŸ“± **`iOS` ã¨ `Android` ä¸¡å¯¾å¿œ:** iOS ã¨ Android ãƒ‡ãƒã‚¤ã‚¹ã®ä¸¡æ–¹ã«å®Œå…¨å¯¾å¿œã—ã€ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é–“ã§ä¸€è²«ã—ãŸä½“é¨“ã‚’æä¾›ã€‚ * ğŸ“± **`Expo` äº’æ›** ### ã¯ã˜ã‚ã« GalleryPreview ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å‰ã«ã€react-native-reanimated ã¨ react-native-gesture-handler ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚è©³ç´°ãªã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¬ã‚¤ãƒ‰ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼š * [Reanimated ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—](https://docs.swmansion.com/react-native-reanimated/docs/fundamentals/getting-started/#installation) * [React Native Gesture Handler ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—](htâ†”ï¸tps://docs.swmansion.com/react-native-gesture-handler/docs/fundamentals/installation) ä¾å­˜é–¢ä¿‚ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ãŸã‚‰ã€react-native-gallery-preview ã‚’ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ ã§ãã¾ã™ï¼š

RowTranslations.originContent: **GalleryPreview** is a flexible modal component for easy gallery previews with full gesture support. Using `Reanimated` and `React Native Gesture Handler`, it gives a smooth and simple user experience for both iOS and Android.
* âš¡  **Smooth Gesture Interactions and Animations:** Experience fluid and responsive animations and gestures for a delightful user interface.
* ğŸ” **Double Tap and Pinch to zoom:** Users can effortlessly zoom in and out of images with simple double-tap and pinch gestures
RowTranslations.translatedContent: * ğŸ“± **`iOS` ã¨ `Android` ä¸¡å¯¾å¿œ:** iOS ã¨ Android ãƒ‡ãƒã‚¤ã‚¹ã®ä¸¡æ–¹ã«å®Œå…¨å¯¾å¿œã—ã€ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é–“ã§ä¸€è²«ã—ãŸä½“é¨“ã‚’æä¾›ã€‚

RowTranslations.originContent: * ğŸ‘† **Pull down to close:** Intuitive pull-down gesture to close the gallery preview, making navigation seamless.
* ğŸ“± **Supports both `iOS` and `Android`:** Fully compatible with both iOS and Android devices, ensuring a consistent experience across platforms.
Before you can use GalleryPreview, you need to set up react-native-reanimated and react-native-gesture-handler. Follow the links below for detailed   installation guides:
Once the dependencies are installed, you can add react-native-gallery-preview to your project:

Content:
```sh
  npm install react-native-gallery-preview
  # or
  yarn add react-native-gallery-preview
  
  ```
Translation:
```sh
  npm install react-native-gallery-preview
  # or
  yarn add react-native-gallery-preview
  
  ```

Content:
### Props

| Prop Name                  | Type                                      | Description                                                                                                                      | Default                                                                                                            |
|----------------------------|-------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `isVisible`                | `boolean`                                 | Controls the visibility of the image viewer modal.                                                                               | -                                                                                                                  |
| `onRequestClose`           | `() => void`                              | Function to close the image viewer modal.                                                                                        | -                                                                                                                  |
| `images`                   | `ImageItemURI[]`                          | Array of image URIs to be displayed.                                                                                             | -                                                                                                                  |
| `initialIndex?`             | `number`                                  | The initial index of the image to be displayed when the viewer is opened.                                                       | `0`                                                                                                                |
| `gap?`                      | `number`                                  | The gap between images in the viewer.                                                                                           | `24`                                                                                                               |
| `simultaneousRenderedImages?` | `number`                                  | The number of images rendered simultaneously for optimization.                                                                | `6`                                                                                                                |                                                                                                           |
| `OverlayComponent?`          | `(props: GalleryOverlayProps) => React.ReactNode` | Optional component to be rendered above the image viewer.                                                          | -                                                                                                                  |
| `ImageComponent?`           | `(props: GalleryImageComponentProps) => React.JSX.Element` | Optional custom component to render each image.                                                                                  | -                                                                                                                  |
| `springConfig?`             | `SpringConfig`                            | Spring configuration for animations.                                                                                             | `{ damping: 1000, mass: 1, stiffness: 250, restDisplacementThreshold: 0.02, restSpeedThreshold: 4 }`                |
| `doubleTabEnabled?`           | `boolean`                                        | Enable or disable double-tap to zoom functionality.                                                                              | `true`                                                                                                             |
| `pinchEnabled?`               | `boolean`                                        | Enable or disable pinch to zoom functionality.                                                                                   | `true`                                                                                                             |
| `swipeToCloseEnabled?`        | `boolean`                                        | Enable or disable swipe to close functionality.                                                                                  | `true`                                                                                                             |
| `backgroundColor?`        | `string`                                        | The background color of the modal, DefaultHeader, and StatusBar.                                                                                | `#000`     
| `headerTextColor?`        | `string`                                        |  Color of text in the header.                                                                                | `#fff`

| Prop Name                  | Type                                      | Description                                                                                                                      | Default                                                                                                            |
|----------------------------|-------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `isVisible`                | `boolean`                                 | ç”»åƒãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¢ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«ã®è¡¨ç¤ºãƒ»éè¡¨ç¤ºã‚’åˆ¶å¾¡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚                                                                                      | -                                                                                                                  |

| `images`                   | `ImageItemURI[]`                          | è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ç”»åƒURIã®é…åˆ—ã€‚                                                                                                             | -                                                                                                                  |
| `initialIndex?`             | `number`                                  | ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¢ãŒé–‹ã‹ã‚ŒãŸæ™‚ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ç”»åƒã®åˆæœŸã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã€‚                                                                             | `0`                                                                                                                |
| `gap?`                      | `number`                                  | ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¢å†…ã®ç”»åƒé–“ã®é–“éš”ã€‚                                                                                                         | `24`                                                                                                               |
| `simultaneousRenderedImages?` | `number`                                  | æœ€é©åŒ–ã®ãŸã‚ã«åŒæ™‚ã«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ç”»åƒã®æ•°ã€‚                                                                                   | `6`                                                                                                                |                                                                                                           |
| `OverlayComponent?`          | `(props: GalleryOverlayProps) => React.ReactNode` | ç”»åƒãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¢ã®ä¸Šã«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã€‚                                                          | -                                                                                                                  |
| `ImageComponent?`           | `(props: GalleryImageComponentProps) => React.JSX.Element` | å„ç”»åƒã‚’ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã€‚                                                                  | -                                                                                                                  |
| `springConfig?`             | `SpringConfig`                            | ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°è¨­å®šã€‚                                                                                                   | `{ damping: 1000, mass: 1, stiffness: 250, restDisplacementThreshold: 0.02, restSpeedThreshold: 4 }`                |
| `doubleTabEnabled?`           | `boolean`                                        | ãƒ€ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—ã§ã‚ºãƒ¼ãƒ ã™ã‚‹æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®æœ‰åŠ¹ãƒ»ç„¡åŠ¹ã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚                                                                            | `true`                                                                                                             |
| `pinchEnabled?`               | `boolean`                                        | ãƒ”ãƒ³ãƒæ“ä½œã§ã‚ºãƒ¼ãƒ ã™ã‚‹æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®æœ‰åŠ¹ãƒ»ç„¡åŠ¹ã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚                                                                              | `true`                                                                                                             |
| `swipeToCloseEnabled?`        | `boolean`                                        | ã‚¹ãƒ¯ã‚¤ãƒ—ã§é–‰ã˜ã‚‹æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®æœ‰åŠ¹ãƒ»ç„¡åŠ¹ã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚                                                                                   | `true`                                                                                                             |
| `backgroundColor?`        | `string`                                        | ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«ã€DefaultHeaderã€StatusBarã®èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ã€‚                                                                                         | `#000`                                                                                                             |
| `headerTextColor?`        | `string`                                        | ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼å†…ã®ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã®è‰²ã€‚                                                                                                         | `#fff`                                                                                                             |

RowTranslations.originContent: | `isVisible`                | `boolean`                                 | Controls the visibility of the image viewer modal.                                                                               | -                                                                                                                  |

| `onRequestClose`           | `() => void`                              | Function to close the image viewer modal.                                                                                        | -                                                                                                                  |

| `images`                   | `ImageItemURI[]`                          | Array of image URIs to be displayed.                                                                                             | -                                                                                                                  |

| `initialIndex?`             | `number`                                  | The initial index of the image to be displayed when the viewer is opened.                                                       | `0`                                                                                                                |

| `gap?`                      | `number`                                  | The gap between images in the viewer.                                                                                           | `24`                                                                                                               |

| `simultaneousRenderedImages?` | `number`                                  | The number of images rendered simultaneously for optimization.                                                                | `6`                                                                                                                |                                                                                                           |

| `OverlayComponent?`          | `(props: GalleryOverlayProps) => React.ReactNode` | Optional component to be rendered above the image viewer.                                                          | -                                                                                                                  |

| `ImageComponent?`           | `(props: GalleryImageComponentProps) => React.JSX.Element` | Optional custom component to render each image.                                                                                  | -                                                                                                                  |

| `springConfig?`             | `SpringConfig`                            | Spring configuration for animations.                                                                                             | `{ damping: 1000, mass: 1, stiffness: 250, restDisplacementThreshold: 0.02, restSpeedThreshold: 4 }`                |

| `doubleTabEnabled?`           | `boolean`                                        | Enable or disable double-tap to zoom functionality.                                                                              | `true`                                                                                                             |

| `pinchEnabled?`               | `boolean`                                        | Enable or disable pinch to zoom functionality.                                                                                   | `true`                                                                                                             |

| `swipeToCloseEnabled?`        | `boolean`                                        | Enable or disable swipe to close functionality.                                                                                  | `true`                                                                                                             |

| `backgroundColor?`        | `string`                                        | The background color of the modal, DefaultHeader, and StatusBar.                                                                                | `#000`
| `headerTextColor?`        | `string`                                        |  Color of text in the header.                                                                                | `#fff`
